item.title: Shoes 10 essential gifts are available on Shoes 4
item.dc:creator: ashbb
item.content:encoded:
At last, Shoes 4 became a minimum Shoes to have the following 10 essential gifts. :)

1.    para
2&3.    stacks & flows
4.    button
5.    image
6.    edit_line
7.    LINK
8.    background
9.    Shoes.url
10.    clear

Shoes 3 has much more features other than listed above.
So, we are going to continue developing Shoes 4 step by step. ;-)

Let's have fun with Shoes 4!

ashbb
